summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Dramatically Different Hydrating Jelly is a lightweight water-jelly face moisturizer. Delivers 24-hour hydration repair plus pollution protection.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.24-hour moisturizer hydrator with Clean Shield Technology locks in the good - like moisture - and filters out the bad.Strengthens skin's moisture barrier and improves resiliency.Unique water-jelly texture feels fresh, penetrates quickly.Oil-free formula is non-sticky, leaves no residue.Skin is smooth, strong, with a pure, clean glow.Proven Results: Makes skin 87% less vulnerable to pollution.*Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, Oil-Free Gel or Jelly. Each step is customized for your skin type.Dermatologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.*In vitro testing on skin modelsBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Key IngredientsClean Shield Technology is formulated with a moisture barrier blend of sunflower seed cake, barley extract, and cucumber fruit extract to strengthen skin's barrier, improve its resiliency, and balance and retain skin's moisture levels.Hyaluronic acid acts as a natural moisture magnet/humectant.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSLSSLESFragranceItem 2531783How To UseSpread moisturizer over face/throat twice daily all over, or where needed. For best results, use after Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau Water\Aqua\Eau, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hypnea Musciformis (Algae) Extract, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'orge, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Sucrose, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Sorbitol, Sodium Polyaspartate, PPG-6-Decyltetradeceth-30, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Trehalose, Polysorbate 80, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hypnea Musciformis (Algae) Extract, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'orge, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Sucrose, Caffeine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Sorbitol, Sodium Polyaspartate, PPG-6-Decyltetradeceth-30, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Trehalose, Polysorbate 80, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Spread moisturizer over face/throat twice daily all over, or where needed. For best results, use after Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Joy in the Morning
reviews.comments: I tend to use facial products with a lot of actives. But this simple and delightful hydrator is just perfect for summer.  I do not have to rush to work in the mornings anymore, so I take this out of the fridge where I store it and pat the jelly under and around my eyes and face and even apply it to my forearms. Then I sit in front of my fan and enjoy perfect cooling and moisturization. As an older woman, this gel formula may not be designed for me in particular, but I find it to be a joy in the morning.

reviews.headline: I will get a bigger one next time!
reviews.comments:
I was worried it was going to be sticky but once it's on and dries, it's not. it's also fragrance free which I love.
I will buy this again!

reviews.headline: Perfect when just need light hydration
reviews.comments: I took this with me on vacation and it was perfect for light hydration under my sunscreen.  Then took it to the beach and used it throughout the day to hydrate my skin in the sun and salt air.  It was amazing!

reviews.headline: Perfect lightweight moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've always had acne prone skin and so many products, especially creamy type moisturizers break me out. This gel moisturizer has been perfect for my skin since I started using it last year and I've not had any more issues with acne. Since it's so lightweight I do like to add a couple drops of Good Molecules Bacuchiol oil for a little extra moisture and it makes it just right.

reviews.headline: Good for am moisturizing but is light
reviews.comments: I do like this moisturizer overall, but it is definitely very thin and lightweight so if you are looking for heavy moisturization this is not the product for you. Is a thin gel but does dry wuickly for make up application.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I bought this to try and switch to a lighter weight formula of hydration. When I tried it out on the back of my hand at the store, it make my skin super soft and hydrated. It even minimized the look of any texture on my hand. So I bought it and tried it for several days before returning it. When I put it on my face, it never seemed to actually absorb. It dried on top of my skin causing almost a cast-like feeling. If I used it under a liquid foundation, it caused crazy amount of pilling. When I used it under powered foundation (Bare Minerals), it gave me some very unsightly texture that I don't usually have. When I returned it, the woman working at the desk said a lot of other people had returned it for the same issues. I ended up going back to my tried and true Moisture Surge

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: This is the best! Works great under makeup. Doesn't pill. Beautiful bottle too.

reviews.headline: I would choose a different moisturizer
reviews.comments: I wasn't wildly impressed with this product. Greatful I got to try it on a great sale.

reviews.headline: Love but need to use other serums as well
reviews.comments:
I tried the sample at the store on my hand and after 5 minutes I saw a huge didference in my hand. I went back afyer contwmplating for 3 days and bought the large size. Im on accutaine and needed to switch to serums for more hydration and I have to say I like using it but I definetly wouldnt use it as a sole moisturizer if you have dry skin
- didnt break me out
- no smell, dries fast, hydrating
- hard to apply: pump often pushes out too much (I try to apply it without hands one drop in 4 places on my face) for cleanliness 
- has lasted me with use 2xs a day for 3 months so far (got the biggest size) and im not halfway

reviews.headline: Yes i would
reviews.comments: Hydration is a 1000

reviews.headline: Totally Clean
reviews.comments:
I love this jelly. 
Feels clean, non greasy and fresh.

reviews.headline: Weightless
reviews.comments: I have bery oily skin. This goes on as a gel and absorbs very quickly with no residue after. Face feels clean after its on.

reviews.headline: Helped clear my acne
reviews.comments: This product helped my acne in under 5 days 10/10 would recommend

reviews.headline: Perfect for summer
reviews.comments: This is my go to moisturizer during the summer for my normal to oily combo skin.  Lightweight and does not  make my skin feel oily.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is the best for my combination skin, it absorbs quickly leaving my skin soft and ready to use sunscreen, foundation or any other skin product. I've always been a Clinique girl they have great skin care products. I've tried a lot of other brands and I always go back to Clinique.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: Of all the daily moisturizing products I have tried over the years, this one is the best. It is so light and a little goes a long way.  I've tried many much higher priced products that do not perform as well.

reviews.headline: Would Repurchase
reviews.comments: Does as advertised, non sticky, and a little goes a long way, great addition to any skincare routine for a more moisturized complexion.

reviews.headline: My favorite face product
reviews.comments: I got this as a gift a year ago from my grandmother and have been obsessed ever since. It is the ONLY moisturizing treatment that does not cause me to flake, break out, or rash. Long lasting, clean, lightweight. Would recommend.

reviews.headline: I love this!
reviews.comments: I have combination Normal to Oily skin.  This moisturizing jelly is truly good for all skin types without any dryness or greasy feel.  I have sensitive skin and it does not break me out. Makeup applies nicely over it.

reviews.headline: From flaky to smooth
reviews.comments: This serum took my akin from flaking to supple and smooth

media.headline: Neither here nor there kind of product
media.caption: Disappointed!

media.headline: How I use the new Dramatically Different moisturizers.
media.caption: My skin is clear and smooth.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This clear, fragrance-free gel is perfect for a summer moisturizer. I love the consistency-it's light and easy to apply. It feels a bit like I splashed some water on my face right after application!

I'm a huge fan of the Moisture Surge Supercharged Concentrate and I was wondering what the difference would be. Obviously the ingredients are different, but I just put them both on my skin (DD on left, MS on right) and I'd say the MS feels slightly more "potent" and a little tacky. I definitely like it better than the yellow DDML gel formula, which was just not hydrating enough for me.

This is a "win" and I hope it stays around! Especially because it's clear and fragrance free... hopefully great for people who are super sensitive.
faceoff_positive.headline: Refreshingly Hydrating

faceoff_negative.comments:
For starters, I've been buying Clinique products since I was 16 (now 45). I have used moisture surge mask, moisture surge "super charged concentrate", dramatically different lotion and gel. Purchased the dramatically different clear "jelly" and was not impressed at all. Honestly, I think you could get the same results from a $5 tube of KY Jelly.

I was not paid, or given free samples to try this product. An honest review from a long time user of Clinique products. Save your money ladies and use one of their other products.
faceoff_negative.headline: Definitely a miss on this one Clinique
